summary: Experienced Senior Software Engineer with strong problem-solving skills and good team-leading skills. I am passionate about using my skills to lead innovative projects and achieve goals collaboratively. I am aspiring for a role that will enable me to further enhance my skills and contribute to organizational growth.

projectDetails.title: Verizon - 5G
details: Verizon 5G Application supports Web, Mobile Browser and Mobile App.
The One-Click-Pay feature to enhance the user experience. Users can easily pay their bills with a single click, streamlining and improving the payment process.
The Arrangements feature allows users to confidently schedule payments for specific dates, ensuring a seamless bill management experience.

The One-Time Payment feature has been implemented to facilitate bill payments, enabling users to make payments using a mobile number without having to log into the application. This feature offers greater flexibility and convenience for all users.
The AutoPay feature allows payments to occur automatically every month, providing a convenient and stress-free experience for users.
The Wallet Management feature enables users to add bank accounts, credit cards, debit cards, and gift cards for efficient payment management.
projectDetails.techStack: React JS, Redux, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Jest Testing Lib, Web Pack, Babel

projectDetails.title: Aspen Connect APP (Android & iOS)
details: The Aspen Connect App is specially designed for doctors.
It provides a single platform to manage emails, chat, appointments, and planned surgery details, which helps save time and avoids the complexity of using multiple applications.
Key features include Microsoft authentication, Microsoft service APIs, integrated Outlook & Teams, appointment details shown in the calendar, and sending reminders.
projectDetails.techStack: Xamarin Forms, C#, MVVM, Microsoft API's and Unit test cases.

workHistory.companyName: SAIS It Services India Pvt Ltd

projectDetails.title: UGO APP (Android & iOS)
details: UGO is a cab services app that aims to simplify and greatly assist users with their transportation needs.
When booking cab services, the estimated price and time shown to the rider will be calculated based on traffic, tollgate fees and distance.
Key features include OAUTH Authentication, Live Tracking & Chat, Google Maps Integration and Google Location Search.
It will save time and effort for the customer.
Developed scalable and maintainable code, ensuring long-term stability of the software.
projectDetails.techStack: Xamarin Forms, C#, MVVM, SQLite local DB, Google API's and Twilio

projectDetails.title: ATPAR APP (Android & iOS)
details: The ATPAR application serves as an effective inventory management system.
The Cycle Count module facilitates the regular counting of inventory items every 6 months.
The Cart Count module streamlines the daily counting of store items.
The Pick module enables the efficient retrieval of items from the inventory.
The Delivery module ensures the prompt delivery of items from the inventory to the stores
The Put away module provides guidance on the optimal placement of items.
The Stock Management module empowers stores to submit new stock requests to the inventory.
Increase revenue by 25%.
projectDetails.techStack: Xamarin Forms, C#, MVVM, SQLite and Scanning QR codes.

education.institution: NALANDA INSTITUTE OF ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY
